name: Dragon Teen on the war path
name_original: Dragon Teen on the war path
description:
One of my prototype setups, a dragon flying around clearing the area for mobs, buildings and items.

Uploading a bunch of prototypes to get a feel for to see interest for possible real project and get feedback

Video:

WASD for movement, Q = toggle flight/walk, Lmouse  = fireball, Rmouse = fireBreath
